name: Bitcoin Watcher (for Mac)
tagline: Simple status bar app to monitor your bitcoin balance.
body:
### Paste your addresses
Paste your bitcoin addresses and this app will show your total balance. Your balance is refreshed every 5 minutes using blockchain.info's api, see https://blockchain.info/q for details.

### Donate
Donations are welcome at [147kyNiZhiDZn5vZyyTRroMtFFPKV8wf1e](http://blockchain.info/address/147kyNiZhiDZn5vZyyTRroMtFFPKV8wf1e)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
